title: Dick Muffin special agent
creator_credit: Jan Bussell, Parthian Production and Peak Films
brief_description: Muffin with his thinking cap. Muffin as sleuth wearing black hat and moustache. A dog comes in and complains that he has lost a bone. Song about the “Old Dry Bone”. Muffin in disguise as a girl with pigtails. Penguin comes and he has lost his stopwatch. Muffin the detective, disguised as a Chinese.
